Descricao1: Hello! My name is Danilo, and I am currently working as an IT Administrative Technician / Full-Stack Developer at the National Commercial Learning Service (SENAC) in Palmas, Tocantins. In this role, I have gained experience in the development and analysis of systems designed to virtualize and resolve manual process issues across various areas of the commercial sector.
Descricao2: At present, I hold a postgraduate degree in Digital Game Design and Development, and I actively participate in game development competitions (Game Jams), having created several games using JavaScript/HTML, Unity 3D, and Python. Digital games have been a part of my life since an early age, and I find the process of creating them to be a highly rewarding challenge.
Desc_proj: Summary list of projects I produced and/or collaborated on. Projects range from games in javascript or Unity3D to websites in Wordpress, React and Vue.
Contato_desc: If you are starting a project, want to make some kind of proposal or just say hi, feel free to get in touch! I will answer you as soon as possible :)
Game_Desc1_1: Winning game of the second edition of the Pequi Jam, currently under development.
Game_Desc2_1: Help Clara collect coffee cups in this distorted-dimension kitchen while racing against time — be careful not to fall or let her inner light fade away.
Game_Desc1_2: My first tag-team fighting game developed in JavaScript as part of my undergraduate thesis project.
Game_Desc2_2: Attack, dodge, or defend against enemy strikes. Once the blue bar is filled, team up with your ally to temporarily merge and unleash a powerful special move!
Game_Desc1_3: A Pokémon-style adventure game I developed using JavaScript and Tiled as a personal study project.
Game_Desc2_3: Focused on turn-based combat mechanics and interactive map building. Due to HTML restrictions, you must click the screen once to activate the background music.
